name: CHENge of Plan
description:
AD/Arrow keys - move left/righ
Spacebar - Jump

Honestly I'm too tired to fix the UI. IT LOOKED DIFFERENT IN UNITY EDITOR. After all day of implementing new features few hours before the deadline, I just want to play FFXIV and eat some snacks.

Some platforms become a little bit tricky just before the end of the game.

I made all the assets and reused a BGM I made few months ago in FL Studio. OG Touhou games, characters and ideas by ZUN of course.

It's sad that I couldn't do everything I planned because I was lacking time and motivation. What we have here is a little prototype of a game but I like it anyway. It's been a great jam for me because I learned so many useful tricks that I am going to use in my future projects. :3

My biggest regret is making 2/10 dialogues few hours before the deadline. This game could have been much more fun with an engaging story.
